com.jme3.scene.plugins.blender.curves

Class CurvesTemporalMesh.BezierLine

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.jme3.scene.plugins.blender.curves.CurvesTemporalMesh.BezierLine
  • Enclosing class:
    CurvesTemporalMesh

    public static class CurvesTemporalMesh.BezierLine
extends java.lang.Object
    A helper class that represents a single bezier line. It consists of Edge's and allows to get a subline of a lentgh of the line.

      • getValueAlongCurve

        public Vector3f getValueAlongCurve(float alongRatio)
        The method computes the value of a point at the certain relational distance from its beggining.
        Parameters:
        alongRatio - the relative distance along the curve; should be a value between 0 and 1 inclusive; if the value exceeds the boundaries it is truncated to them
        Returns:
        computed value along the curve
